settings.title: The Distillery Caf√©
settings.text:
We sell locally made soups, fresh sandwiches, cakes and scones; as well as a great range of loose leaf teas and freshly ground coffee.

We offer a selection of soft drinks, local beers and of course, our own range of whiskies and gins!

Our dog-friendly cafe is open daily from 9.30am-4.30pm, with both indoor seating and an outdoor terrace.

No booking required.

Follow us on facebook!

settings.title: Distillery Shop
settings.text:
Our shop stocks a large selection of Kingsbarns and Wemyss Malts whiskies, Darnley's Gins and Rimauresq fine wines from the Wemyss family's vineyard in Provence. We also have a selection of whisky and gin-related gifts and souvenirs, glasses and books, hipflasks and hats.

You can buy gifts made from our upcycled bottles, and you can even personalise most items, with our onsite engraving machine!

The distillery shop is open from 10am-5pm, every day.

You can also shop online via our online stores.
